Description: The following statement contains a magic number: var config = new StrictTransportSecurityOptions {                  IncludeSubDomains = true'                  MaxAge = 31536000'                  RedirectToSecureTransport = true'                  RedirectUriBuilder = uri => ""' // Only do this' when you want to replace the default behavior (from http to https).
